headline: VICI Properties Inc. Announces Release Date for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: NEW YORK, January 08, 2026--VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE: VICI) ("VICI Properties" or the "Company") announced today that it will release its fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results on Wednesday, February 25, 2026 after the close of trading on the New York Stock Exchange. The Company will host a conference call and audio webcast on Thursday, February 26, 2026 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time (ET).
